attributes.title: Terrible Gliches
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to keep up with News about our president And I glitched harder than ever I couldn’t connected to Internet until I deleted it the app froze my phone for a total of 5 minutes

attributes.title: Blegh
attributes.review:
I kid you not. This app zapped my hamster right out of its cage and across my room. When I tried to catch my hamster the app zapped it again and now I have NO IDEA WHERE HE WENT. Not only will this app steal your time but also your hamsters. BEWARE. 
But if anybody sees a small hamster with pink spots let me know.

attributes.userName: tik tok made me rate this app
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: I bought $500 worth of merchandise and they asked where my address was and I gave it to them and a bunch of people riding dinosaurs came in and said that they were the FBI they stole my teapot in my China set because apparently it’s illegal to have anything with the word China in it in America IT WAS MY GREAT GRANNY POOS 😤😤😤

attributes.title: Don’t download or he will come for you
attributes.review: This app will steam you information and all of the news is a fake my friends dad worked for the government and had his dad look at the news and said it’s all fake and all a scam

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is absolutely disgusting and horrible. As soon as i opened the app it could sense that i was a woman and started sexually harassing me. This app is pointless and has no use and should DEFINITELY be removed from the app store for saying racist,sexist,and all around disgusting remarks.

attributes.title: Make America Smart Again, Don’t Download
attributes.review: This app is so glitchy and is constantly giving out racist, sexist, homophobic, and transphobic propaganda and misinformation. Please whatever you do don’t download. This app is also responsible for a huge influx of hate crime since 2016.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and i was lied to. I thought this was Subway Surf but instead its a cheeto puff app? Unbelievable, i recommend for next time to put more information in the description. One star completely unbelievable😾🙅🏻‍♀️

this app is the actual worst. as soon as I logged on all I got was info about TRUMP. why would anyone make an app for that. it also somehow made me miss my ride this morning and spill my soymilk all over me last night. so I suggest u don’t get this app!

attributes.title: Really bad app
attributes.review: I was vacuuming my driveway and it kept giving me notifications! Also, it made my dolphin act irrationally while I was walking her. Never downloading this game. Very slow, I made my pet sloth race it and the sloth won. Just goes to show, a sloth will be the Lorax. Anyways trump2020 in a gravestone❤️❤️

attributes.userName: you ugly if you like him
attributes.title: sofia the first❤️
attributes.review:
I was a girl in the village doing all right 
Then I became a princess over night 
Now I gotta figure out how to do it right 
So much to learn and see! 

Up in the castle with my new family 
And a school that's just for royalty 
A whole enchanted world is waiting for me 
I'm so excited to be... (Sofia the First!) 

I'm finding out what being royal's all about (Sofia the First!) 
Making my way, it's an adventure every day! (Sofia) 
It's gonna be my time (Sofia) 
To show them all that I'm 
Sofia the First!
